predicate.note: Frames file for 'desire' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 32.1, Framenet entry Experiencer_subj.

example.name: not like any ringers I know
example.text: In the torrent of replies that followed, one woman ringer from Solihull observed that ``the average male ringer leaves quite a lot *trace* *trace* to be desired *trace*: badly dressed, decorated with acne and a large beer-belly, frequently unwashed and unbearably flatulent in peals.''

example.name: active
example.text: Seeking to allay European concerns, U.S. Agriculture Secretary Clayton Yeutter said in Washington that the new U.S. plan wouldn't ``put farmers out of business'' but would encourage them to ``grow what the markets desire *trace* instead of what the government wants.''
